synopsis.text: Last century, Shi Dali was mysteriously sealed away for 100 years. When he awakens in the present day, he accidentally discovers Qingqing, a celestial nine-tailed fox spirit from a parallel world. Intrigued by Qingqing's origins and powers, Shi Dali partners with her and sets out on a journey to uncover the truth behind his own hidden past. Along the way, he begins training to become a powerful Chief Soul Master in order to protect both worlds from impending danger. With new friendships forged and unbelievable abilities awakened within him, Shi Dali races against time to solve the mysteries surrounding him before catastrophe strikes. His adventures will reveal shocking revelations about his origins while leading him to discover his greater purpose.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
